definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: expose, lay bare (NH Pi. disclose, make known; cf. Ar. jala9a (Frey)

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: jali9a patuit (os) labiis non tegentibus dentes; impudica fuit (mulier); comp. also Syr. glw9 circumcise (in Lexx.); Eth. gal9: cortex, crusta, testa; Gr:Monatsschr. 1884, 24 f.; Schult Thes De Pr 17:14 Fl in De, Now Str & most der. Heb. mng. from Ar.

definitions.title: b;
definitions.body: shew the teeth, then snarl, quarrel (cf. Ar. conj. III), but v. Gr:l. c.)—

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הִתְגַּלַּע]] Pr 17:14; Impf. [[יִתְגַּלָָּע]] Pr 18:1, Pr 20:3; —disclose oneself, break out, Pr 17:14 subj. [[רִיב]]; break or burst out in contention, strife Pr 20:3 subj. [[כָּל־אֱוִיל]]; similarly Pr 18:1 (sq. [[בְּ]] against; Gr:l. c. prop. [[יִלְעַג]] or [[יַלְעִיג]]).
